findings.pulmonary: Minimal dependent atelectasis, 2 mm nodule in right lower lobe, small bilateral pleural effusions.
findings.kidneys: Tiny hypodensity within right lower renal pole measuring 4 mm, likely an AML, stable compared to prior studies.
findings.appendix: Abnormally dilated and thickened measuring up to 1.6 cm, with associated inflammatory stranding and a small intramural abscess measuring 0.9 x 0.9 x 1.1 cm.
